title: Minecraft PE 可能會新增月亮
author: 小小安
txt_content:
剛剛Tommaso Checchi說:
可能會新增月亮 但應該不是在0.7.3

replies.author: raysuperman
replies.txt_content: 希望连太阳一起 ＝＝

replies.author: Im_Axiian
replies.txt_content:
Minecraft PE 也表示将会在未来版本加入太阳,月亮和星星.
